DISCONNECT
TO RECONNECT

Join us on a "choose your own adventure" style campout as we celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over three days, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

Sponsored by

Try something new

or refine your skills by climbing, hiking, kayaking, mountain biking, swimming, or practicing yoga. At night, join everyone for a communal dinner or do your own thing before dancing and listening to music.

Volunteer
your talent

Like anything, Coalescence is what you make it. We ask every Coalescee contribute somehow--whether its leading an activity, organizing a gear exchange or throwing a camp party.

Join us

June 11-14, 2021

This is our inaugural camp out. Be one of the few founding members that shape Coalescence.
